radio_info.rest: a radio station by students for students. Since then, almost 20 years later, it still works facilities thanks to the tenacity and perseverance of the officers. Through this small building in the shadow of the former Commercial School, found, at least once, all students spending ever Karlobasi. Today, the area is maintained and operated with the help and support of the entire student community of Samos.
